pageContext.claim: “The story by Axios that President Trump wanted to blow up large hurricanes with nuclear weapons prior to reaching shore is ridiculous. I never said this. Just more FAKE NEWS!”
pageContext.analysis: Whether or not he suggested using nuclear weapons, Trump repeatedly floated the idea of using bombs to stop hurricanes. Axios reported that a National Security Council memo from 2017 describes a conversation "in which Trump asked whether the administration should bomb hurricanes to stop them from hitting the homeland."
